system.description:
Simple in make and function, these prostheses arenâ€™t fancy, but they get the job done. These might include simplistic wooden hands or peg prostheses, or slightly more refined
designs where gravity is used to maneuver the joints.

Effect: While wearing a Basic Prosthesis, the limb has a full range of mobility and function, and any reduction to SPD is negated. Due to its lack of fine motor function, all attack and defense checks made with a prosthetic arm are made at a -3. In the case of a Basic Prosthetic Leg, all Dodge/Escape checks are made at a -1. 

Additionally, a Basic Prosthesis cannot be used to channel Chaos. Any attack made against a prosthetic limb is redirected towards its wearer for gameplay purposes.
